mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT PDT_NO,PDT_CATEGORY,PDT_PRICE,PDT_NAME,PDT_INTRO,PDT_STATUS,PDT_DATE,PDT_DETAIL_IMAGE,EVENT_NO_REF,E.EVENT_SALE_PER, LISTAGG(PDT_THUMB_IMAGE,',') WITHIN GROUP(ORDER BY T.pdt_no_ref) OVER(PARTITION BY T.PDT_NO_REF)AS THUMBS FROM PRODUCT P JOIN PRODUCT_THUMB T ON(PDT_NO=T.PDT_NO_REF) LEFT JOIN EVENT E ON(P.EVENT_NO_REF=E.EVENT_NO) WHERE PDT_NO=#{pdtNo} ORDER BY PDT_DATE DESC

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PRODUCT
WHERE PDT_CATEGORY=#{category}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PRODUCT JOIN EVENT ON(EVENT_NO=EVENT_NO_REF) WHERE EVENT_NO_REF IS NOT NULL AND EVENT_SALE_PER > 0

SELECT DISTINCT P.PDT_NO,PDT_CATEGORY,PDT_PRICE,PDT_NAME,PDT_STATUS,PDT_DATE,EVENT_NO_REF,E.EVENT_SALE_PER, LISTAGG(PDT_THUMB_IMAGE,',') WITHIN GROUP(ORDER BY pdt_no_ref) OVER(PARTITION BY PDT_NO_REF)AS THUMBS, COUNT(DISTINCT Z.PDT_NO) OVER(PARTITION BY P.PDT_NO) AS ZZIM_COUNT, COUNT(DISTINCT R.PDT_NO) OVER(PARTITION BY R.PDT_NO) AS REVIEW_COUNT FROM PRODUCT P JOIN PRODUCT_THUMB ON(P.PDT_NO=PDT_NO_REF) LEFT JOIN EVENT E ON(P.EVENT_NO_REF=E.EVENT_NO) LEFT OUTER JOIN ZZIMCONTENT Z ON(P.PDT_NO=Z.PDT_NO) LEFT OUTER JOIN REVIEW R ON(P.PDT_NO=R.PDT_NO)
WHERE PDT_CATEGORY IN(#{category})
ORDER BY PDT_DATE DESC
ORDER BY REVIEW_COUNT DESC
ORDER BY PDT_PRICE
ORDER BY PDT_PRICE DESC

SELECT DISTINCT P.PDT_NO,PDT_CATEGORY,PDT_PRICE,PDT_NAME,PDT_STATUS,PDT_DATE,EVENT_NO_REF,E.EVENT_SALE_PER, LISTAGG(PDT_THUMB_IMAGE,',') WITHIN GROUP(ORDER BY pdt_no_ref) OVER(PARTITION BY PDT_NO_REF)AS THUMBS, COUNT(DISTINCT Z.PDT_NO) OVER(PARTITION BY P.PDT_NO) AS ZZIM_COUNT, COUNT(DISTINCT R.PDT_NO) OVER(PARTITION BY R.PDT_NO) AS REVIEW_COUNT FROM PRODUCT JOIN PRODUCT_THUMB ON(P.PDT_NO=PDT_NO_REF) LEFT JOIN EVENT E ON(EVENT_NO_REF=EVENT_NO) LEFT OUTER JOIN ZZIMCONTENT Z ON(P.PDT_NO=Z.PDT_NO) LEFT OUTER JOIN REVIEW R ON(P.PDT_NO=R.PDT_NO) WHERE EVENT_NO_REF IS NOT NULL AND E.EVENT_SALE_PER > 0
ORDER BY PDT_DATE DESC
ORDER BY REVIEW_COUNT DESC
ORDER BY PDT_PRICE
ORDER BY PDT_PRICE DESC

SELECT PDT_NO,PDT_DATE FROM PRODUCT WHERE PDT_DATE>SYSDATE-7
AND PDT_CATEGORY=#{category}
